import.name: Damage Self
import.description: Deal damage to yourself

import.name: Deal Damage
import.description: Deal damage to another creature

import.name: Take Damage
import.description: Take damage from another entity, object, or the environment

import.name: Move
import.description: Move to another location by walking/running, swimming, or flying. You may have different speeds for each and the environment may restirct you options

import.name: Climb
import.description: Climb the side of a object or a rope. Typically this happens at half your ground movement speed but see your ${Climb Speed}$.

import.name: Swim
import.description: Swim through a liquid. Typically this happens at half your ground movement speed but see your ${Climb Speed}$.

import.name: Crawl
import.description: Crawl on the ground at half your ${Movement Speed}$.

import.name: Jump
import.description: Jump while moving at up to your ${Movement Speed}$. A single jump can not exceed your ${Movement Speed}$ without additional factors.

import.name: Stand Up
import.description: Stand up from a prone or crawling state. This takes half your ${Movement Speed}$.

import.name: Grapple Shuffle
import.description: If moving while you have a creature grappled, you move at half your normal speed in that situation.

import.name: Take Damage
import.description: You are taking damage.

import.name: Improvised
import.description: Move in some described manner at the Dungeon Master's discretion and may involve ${Skill Check}$s.

import.name: Attack
import.description: Make an ${Attack Roll}$ against a target to deal damage. In some cases you can attempt non-lethal damage or to target a specific body part, but this will make the attack much more difficult (Generally +5 to the Target's AC).

import.name: Dash
import.description: Move up to your max movement distance for the type of movement you are want to dash as (Such as swimming, running, or flying)

import.name: Hide
import.description: Attempt to duck away from sight so that people aren't aware of you.

import.name: Use
import.description: Operate an item, such as opening a door or desk, or flipping a switch

import.name: Help
import.description: Help another creature perform a ${Skill Check}$, giving them advantage

import.name: Disengage
import.description: Removes a creature's option of an ${Attack of Oppurtunity}$ against you when you move out of their threat radius

import.name: Dodge
import.description: You enter a defensive state giving all attacks against you ${Disadvantage}$.

import.name: Grapple
import.description: When you want to grab a creature or wrestle with it, you can replace one of your ${Attack Action}$s to grapple. Your target can be up to 1 size larger, within melee, and you mysh have at least one free hand. You perform an ${Athletics}$ check against your target's ${Athletics}$ or ${Acrobatics}$ check. Once ${Grappled}$, the target can perform either check as an ${Action}$ to attempt to break free.

import.name: Push
import.description: Perform an ${Atheletics}$ check to attempt to push a creature or an object. If a creature is targeted and resistant, a ${Melee Attack}$ may need rolled.

import.name: Extra Attack
import.description: If you opt to ${Attack}$ you may instead attack twice with your main weapon instead of once.

import.name: Use Potion
import.description: Use a potion.

import.name: Cast a Spell
import.description: Cast a spell that has a ${Casting Time}$ or takes an ${Action}$.

import.name: Perform a skill check
import.description: Cast a spell that has a ${Casting Time}$ or takes an ${Action}$.

import.name: Off-Hand Attack
import.description: You may attack with your off-hand weapon.

import.name: Use Quick Potion
import.description: Quickly use a potion.

import.name: Cast a small Spell
import.description: Cast a spell that takes a ${Bonus Action}$.

import.name: Cast a Cantrip
import.description: In some situations you may be able to Cast a ${Cantrip}$ as ${Bonus Action}$.

import.name: Attack of Oppurtunity
import.description: If a creature you wish to strike leaves your ${Threat Radius}$ without disengaging or other special circumstances then you may use your ${Reaction}$ to perform an ${Attack}$ against that creature.

import.name: Counter a Spell
import.description: Counter a spell. See ${Counterspell}$ for details.

import.name: Reaction Cast
import.description: Cast a Spell as a reaction.

import.name: Breath Weapon
import.description: Use a charge of your Breath Weapon to damage creatures in an area.

import.name: Short Rest
import.description: Sit and rest for 30 minutes.

import.name: Long Rest
import.description: Sleep for 6 to 10 hours depending on your comfort and situation to regain your vitality.

import.name: Finished a Long Rest
import.description: Fired when a long rest is finished.

import.name: Trance
import.description: Meditate for 4 to 5 hours depending on your comfort and situation to regain your vitality.

import.name: Quip
import.description: 6 words may be spoken on your turn in combat without the need for an action. More will use your ${Bonus Action}$ or ${Main Action}$ depending on the words and the situation.

import.name: Start of Turn
import.description: Start of your turn in combat.

import.name: End of Turn
import.description: End of your turn in combat.

import.name: Start of Round
import.description: Start of the round of combat.

import.name: End of Round
import.description: End of a round of combat.

import.name: Enter Rage
import.description: Enter a rage and gain the ${Raging}$ effect.

import.name: Breakfree: Grapple
import.description: You are currently being ${Grappled}$ but may take this action to make an ${Athletics}$ or ${Acrobatics}$ check contested by the grapplers ${Athletics}$ to break free.
